example.eg: Bert stepped outside to think for a moment.
example.egtrans: 伯特到外面去，自己思考一会儿。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 思考, 考虑, 思索

example.eg: Perhaps this painting would look better on that wall; what do you think?
example.egtrans: 或许那面墙上挂这幅画要更好看点，你觉得呢？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以为, 认为, 觉得

example.eg: I think Tom's coming with us. I'll just ask him.
example.egtrans: 我想，汤姆应该会和我们一起来，我去问问他。

example.eg: I think I'll go to the grocer's now.
example.egtrans: 我打算现在就去杂货店。

example.eg: I don't know at the moment; I need to think about it again.
example.egtrans: 现在我还不知道；我需要再想想。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 思考, 思索, 反省

example.eg: He was saddened, and thought about her situation all the time.
example.egtrans: 他心绪黯然，一直想着她的处境。

example.eg: We're thinking of going to that new Italian restaurant tonight.
example.egtrans: 我们正在考虑今晚去吃吃看那家新开的意大利餐厅。

example.eg: Don't even think about asking me to do you any more favours!
example.egtrans: 想都别想让我再帮你任何忙！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想着, 考虑, 打算

example.eg: He thought of a new way to manufacture pencils.
example.egtrans: 他发明出了生产铅笔的新方法。

example.eg: I think of him as my friend.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 认为, 当作, 判定

example.eg: Have a think, and tell me what you want to do.
Don't bother him, he's thinking.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 思索, 深思，沉思, 冥想

example.eg: You can't leave me! Think of the children!
example.egtrans: 你不能离开我！想想孩子们！

example.eg: The first time I met Charles, I thought him a vain man.
He thought it right to pay his taxes.
Can you think what we did last weekend?
example.egtrans: 你还记得上周末我们做了什么吗？

example.eg: What do you think will happen?
When I pack for a vacation, I try to think ahead and bring all the items that I might need.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 为未来做打算, 长远考虑

example.eg: Think over what I said and let me know tomorrow what your decision is.
example.egtrans: 请仔细考虑我说的话，然后明天再告诉我你的决定。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细思考某事, 好好考虑某事

example.eg: Hey Jane, I just thought up a solution to your problem!
example.egtrans: 嘿，简！我刚想出你那个问题的解决方案了！

example.eg: "Daisy's married someone she's only just met? I wonder how that's going to turn out." "I dread to think."

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不敢想象, 不敢设想

example.eg: I dread to think how the victim's family must be feeling.
When Tom asked me if Sally was coming to the party I replied "I don't think so".

trans_examp.trans_cn: 我认为并非如此, 我不同意

example.eg: "Is he coming with us?" "I think so, but let me call him to make sure."
I did not think much of that artist's new exhibit, I thought it was trite.
Try to think back: do you recall noticing anything unusual about him?
I thought better of sending my boss an angry email when I remember how much I needed my salary.
I would think better of him if he was more easy-going.
He had to think hard to remember the exact details of the conversation.
The boss seems to think highly of you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…高度评价, 对…评价颇高

example.eg: I'll think it over and let you know my decision.
He is a rich man and thinks little of spending a million on a new car.

dsense.name: think long and hard, think long and hard about [sth]
think out loud, also UK: think aloud

example.eg: The company values employees who can think outside the box and find creative solutions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 创造性地思考, 跳出框框思考, 跳出传统的思维框架

example.eg: You'll do fine on the test. Keep thinking positive!
The Rand Corporation is a famous think tank in the US.
He thinks the world of his children.
Juliet had to think through Romeo's wedding proposal.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细思考, 彻底地想清楚, 深思熟虑, 三思

example.eg: My granny was about to give her bank details to a salesman on the phone, but I told her to think twice.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 再三考虑, 重新考虑

example.eg: Think twice about the personal information you share online.

dsense.name: think twice about doing [sth], think twice before doing [sth], think twice before you do [sth]

example.eg: You should think twice about giving up a steady job to start a PhD.
Amy's parents think well of her new boyfriend.
Does this color look good on me? What do you think?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 你觉得如何？, 你认为呢？
